About Me

I'm a full stuck developer based in Portland,Oregon.
I am passionate about new techonologies, new ideas and love to create web applications!
Check out my resume and my album to know me more! Album Resume

2013-09

I came to United States for an english program at Oregon State University

2014-09

I wanted to challenge myslef, so I chosed Energy Systems Engineering as my degree when I finished the english program

2017-06

I always wanted to gain some leadership skills, so I campained for Vice president of student government at OSU-Cascades and elected by study body. I was overseen Student Fee Comittee and allocated student fee $700,000

2019-04

Started my internship with Jacobs Engineering as a controls intern. Performed LEED calculation for a datacenter project, also helped mechanical group with ventilation modeling project , improved the work efficiency by 80%

2019-09

Graduated from Oregon State University, went back to China and visited my family

2019-12

I wanted to learn programming, so I joined a coding bootcamp, started full time study in web developoment

2020-01

Led my first group project (Alphabet Learning App) after 3 weeks of learn programming.

2020-03

Led my second group project (Glocal Events Tracker).

2020-04 - Current

Finished the second phase of the web development program, and continueing learning and developing myself while qurantine at home
